articles.description: Follow live text commentary from the final day of the Solheim Cup between Europe and the United States at Finca Cortesin in Spain.
articles.title: Solheim Cup: Europe and US start final day level at 8-8

articles.description: Follow live score & text updates as Stoke City host Hull City and Sunderland face Cardiff City in the Championship.
articles.title: Championship: Stoke v Hull before Sunderland v Cardiff

articles.description: Only one player from England's starting XV against Chile will be promoted into Steve Borthwick's first-choice team, but it should be more, says Matt Dawson.
articles.title: 'Smith could be a quarter-final starter - but he won't be'

articles.description: Ethiopia's Tigist Assefa smashes the women's marathon world record as she wins Sunday's race in Berlin.
articles.title: Assefa smashes women's marathon world record

articles.description: Red Bull's Max Verstappen dominates the Japanese Grand Prix to take his 13th victory of the year and help his team clinch the constructors' title.
articles.title: Verstappen wins in Japan as Red Bull take teams title

articles.description: Ireland's thunderous Pool B win over holders South Africa in Paris gives the Rugby World Cup a much-needed shot in the arm.
articles.title: 'Epic Irish win gives World Cup shot in the arm'

articles.description: Match of the Day's Gary Lineker and Danny Murphy discuss why Rasmus Hojlund will be a success for Manchester United after a promising performance in their 1-0 win at Burnley.
articles.title: Why Hojlund will be a Man Utd success - MOTD analysis

articles.description: Sheffield United will "celebrate and honour" the life of Maddy Cusack in a tribute before their men's match against Newcastle on Sunday.
articles.title: Sheffield Utd to 'celebrate and honour' Cusack

articles.description: British heavyweight Joe Joyce says his second consecutive defeat by Zhilei Zhang is "not the end of the world" and rules out retirement.
articles.title: Joyce rules out retirement after Zhang rematch loss

articles.description: Manchester United and England striker Marcus Rashford is unhurt after being involved in a car crash on Saturday night.
articles.title: Man Utd's Rashford not injured after car crash
